subject: Switzerland delivery
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Team,

I'd like to ask, if you ship your products to Switzerland? If yes, do you
ship it DDP (duty delivery paid) including VAT, or do you not handle taxes?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Adam Kozak

conversations.body_text: 你好，Adam Kozak，  您好！我们可以通过UPS发货到瑞士。 请告知您需要哪些产品，并提供详细清单——我们会根据总价和重量计算运费并估算任何适用的关税。
